subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Video of the "Edison Box"
author: JayW Prather
full_text:
---2065874650-25866383-1320710238=:57475
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Wow so much for unity and research for the common good of all. I really don=
t give a rat's ass what anything is called as long as people keep researchi=
ng,experimenting and building things. If one doesnt work, oh well we just t=
ake it back to the bench and build a new one, to hell with what is it calle=
d or who built it. I have hacked over=C2=A025 different=C2=A0radio brands a=
nd/or models=C2=A0and by hack I dont mean just snipping a wire, some I=C2=
=A0 turn it into little pieces and start over with a whole new 2,3 or even =
a 4 brand hybrid. And by then the name of it ,or even who I am, is irreleve=
nt the only thing that matters is "does it work or not?" Not trying to piss=
 on any shoes but this just got really weird, really quick and we (the buil=
ders)dont matter the only thing that should is the equipment and what it ca=
n do. Sorry if I offended anyone.
=C2=A0
Jay W. Prather


_________________=

From: Ursula Kalin <kalinu@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com
Sent: Monday, November 7, 2011 6:05 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re=
: Video of the "Edison Box"


 
=C2=A0  
 
 
so you call radio shacks Frank=
 Box? because I correct people who call those Frank Boxes...for the record
=
=C2=A0spirit Medium Ursula Kalin

om/page/page/8051317.htm

 From: don powell <dpowell7299@...>
To: "EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com"=
 <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Mon, November 7, 2011 1:25:13 PM
Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Video of the "Edison Box"

=C2=A0 

 
Not to mention that=
 Edison never built his spirit phone. =C2=A0He only theorized that such a d=
evice *could* be built. =C2=A0People really need to do 15 mins worth of res=
earch before naming these things :)) 
 
Don 
 
For the record, I correct ev=
eryone around me that call them=C2=A0anything=C2=A0but Frank's box. 
 

___=
_____________________________
 From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@gma=
il.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, November 7, 2011 12:19 PM=

Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Video of the "Edison Box"


=C2=A0 
1-Calling an Ed=
ison box is sham and scam. A way of trying to lend credbility to it, and re=
move me from box history, and it does look suspicioulsy like what I make. I=
t is also ignoring all EVI-ITC history of the last one hundred years. How m=
any here realize the ghost box, or radio sweep method used to be called Dir=
ect Radio Voice, and has long history? I have never heard any stories of Ed=
ison getting radio contacts wioht spirit.
How many have even done five minu=
tes of research on the history of EVP. I can tell ya, none! No, y'all want =
to sit in the dark and ask what color your shirt is then claim to be great =
researchers and experts. 

2-I doubt that it truely random, I'd like to see=
 a scope vid of the sweep modes. 

I wouldn't have problem, but these peopl=
e like the one putting on this video belittle and insult me in public. For =
what? For their own fame and fortune. Then try to copy Chirs Moon, and blam=
e the concept on Edison--freaking
 clueless, all of you!

--- In EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com, "Urkel23" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
> This video explains al=
l the features of the box. So, get some popcorn and enjoy.
> 
> This is the=
 first box to have shack hack modes as well as linear and random adjustable=
 sweeps.
> 
> Also, the only box other than the "Minibox" to have a working=
 random circuit in it. 
> 
> The video:
> 
> http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=
=3D9539MtbvRc4
> 
> 
> -Steve H.
>
